attributes.action: Staff in care homes, supported living etc, during COVID19  Make wages untaxable
attributes.additional_details: They are more vulnerable risking their lives and families to support people and the nation to live their quality life as much as possible.
attributes.background: To untax the wages of front line care staff working during the Covid 19 out break.

rejection.details:
We think this petition is similar:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306845
